title: Test Case 1 - Apply Now Redirection
description: Verify the user is redirected to the Application progress page by clicking on Apply Now
steps: 1. Launch the application https://nada-hei.onrender.com/ 2. Click on Apply Now

title: Test Case 2 - Contact Form Submission
description: Verify user can fill out the contact form and proceed to next step
steps: 1. Navigate to contact page 2. Fill contact form with valid data 3. Click Next

title: Test Case 3 - Property Type Selection
description: Verify user can select property type and fill property details
steps: 1. Navigate to property page 2. Fill home value 3. Fill mortgage balance 4. Select property type

title: Test Case 4 - Financial Information Form
description: Verify user can complete financial information section
steps: 1. Navigate through contact and property pages 2. Complete credit score selection 3. Fill address information

title: Test Case 5 - Credit Score Question
description: Verify user can answer credit score questions
steps: 1. Navigate to credit score page 2. Select credit score option 3. Proceed to next step
